data.question: What is the empirical formula of PCN-250 (Fe) at 323K?
At what temperature was the highest BET surface area observed for PCN-250 (Fe2Ni)?
Is the crystal system of PCN-250 (Fe2Co) at 323K cubic?
What is the volume in Å3 of PCN-250 (FeNi2) at 100K?
Does increasing the temperature to 473K decrease the terminal O occupancy in PCN-250 (Fe2Mg)?
What is the formula weight of PCN-250 (Fe2Zn) at 423K?
Is the space group of PCN-250 (Fe2Ni) at 373K P-43n?
What is the change in terminal O occupancy from 323K to 473K for PCN-250 (Fe2Co)?
Does PCN-250 (FeNi2) have a cubic crystal system at all measured temperatures?
What is the empirical formula of PCN-250 (Fe2Mg) at 473K?
What is the effect of Ni substitution on the thermal activation process of PCN-250?
data.answer: Reduces the activation temperature and exposes more metal sites

data.question: Is the volume of PCN-250 (Fe2Zn) at 323K greater than at 473K?
What is the coordination number (CN) of Fe-O in PCN-250 (Fe) at 326K?
Does the terminal O occupancy of PCN-250 (Fe2Ni) at 473K indicate complete removal of terminal O ligands?
What is the trend in terminal O occupancy for divalent metal-substituted PCN-250 as temperature increases?
data.answer: The terminal O occupancy decreases as the temperature increases

data.question: Is the empirical formula of PCN-250 (Fe2Co) at 100K C8H3Co0.33Fe0.67NO4.5?
What is the effect of thermal activation on the color of PCN-250 (Fe) crystals?
data.answer: Changes from dark red to black

data.question: Does the PXRD pattern of as-synthesized PCN-250 (Fe) match the simulated PXRD?
What is the formula weight of PCN-250 (Fe2Mg) at 323K?
What is the role of Ni2+ in forming stronger interactions with N2 molecules in PCN-250?
data.answer: Ni2+ facilitates stronger π-backbonding interactions with N2 molecules
